name: Kwiko's Trek
description:
Your name is Kwiko! You and your friends live peacefully by the pond in the forest. One day, however, your precious egg was stolen by a mysterious tentacle that appeared out of the ground! Take a trek through this mysterious world to recover your treasured egg! Collect fruits along the way so you can provide food for your friends and family!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Look around: Mouse
  • Jump: Space

Created for the Fall 2021 Intro to Game Development course at Virginia Tech.
